com.captcha.botdetect.internal.infrastructure.text

Class StringHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.captcha.botdetect.internal.infrastructure.text.StringHelper

  • public class StringHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class used for common string operations used by BotDetect code.
